description: Retrieves information about a gallery Application Definition.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

gallery_name.description: The name of the Shared Application Gallery from which the Application Definitions are to be retrieved.

gallery_application_name.description: The name of the gallery Application Definition to be retrieved.
